plot: When a young husband can't fall back asleep after a horrible nightmare, he tries to enlist the help of his peacefully sleeping wife. Big mistake.
title: Waking Sonya
plot_es: When a young husband can't fall back asleep after a horrible nightmare, he tries to enlist the help of his peacefully sleeping wife. Big mistake.
plot_en: When a young husband can't fall back asleep after a horrible nightmare, he tries to enlist the help of his peacefully sleeping wife. Big mistake.
